gen2x2BlackBasis() - Method in class visualcryptography.matrix.MatrixConstructor
Constructs the zero-one Matrix c1 for 2x2 Visual Cryptography Matrix looks like 1 0 1 0 0 1 0 1
gen2x2WhiteBasis() - Method in class visualcryptography.matrix.MatrixConstructor
Constructs the zero-one Matrix c0 for 2x2 Visual Cryptography.
gen2xNBlackBasis(int) - Method in class visualcryptography.matrix.MatrixConstructor
Generates the basis matrix c1 for encrypting the black pixel for the 2xn VCS.
gen2xNWhiteBasis(int) - Method in class visualcryptography.matrix.MatrixConstructor
Generates the basis matrix c0 for encrypting the white pixel for the 2xn VCS.

Generates the basis matrix c0 for encrypting the white pixel for the nxn VCS.

Submit a bug or feature at laizzez_faire07(@)yahoo.com. Visual Cryptography is an implementation of the newly discovered and developed visual encryption algorithm by Naor and Shamir at the Eurocrypt 1994. Copyright 2005 University of the Philippines, Los Ba±os, Laguna. All rights reserved.
